meanings.definition: Excessive emphasis or importance placed on something.
meanings.sent1: The overemphasis on winning made the game less enjoyable for everyone.
meanings.sent2: She always adds an overemphasis on details in her presentations.
meanings.sent3: The overemphasis on eating healthy led to a hilarious incident at the ice cream shop.
meanings.sent4: His overemphasis on punctuality turned him into the office clock.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's overemphasis on neat handwriting made the students nervous about their essays.

meanings.definition: To place too much emphasis on something.
meanings.sent1: Please do not overemphasis your achievements during the interview.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overemphasis the negatives and overlook the positives.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally overemphasized the importance of bringing a pencil to the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The coach warned the team not to overemphasis individual performance over teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The politician's tendency to overemphasis his opponent's flaws backfired during the debate.
